definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: Would you mind giving us a demo right now?
sentences.chinese: 現在你能給我們試播一下嗎？

sentences.english: Broadcast pilots generally film from the beginning of March through the end of April.
sentences.chinese: 試播節目一般從3月初拍攝到4月底。
